title.narrative: Strengthening the resilience of the poorest communities' food security mechanisms and coping strategies in Takhar and Badakshan, Afghanistan

description.narrative: Overall objective: Strengthen the resilience of food security and nutrition of the most food insecure communities in the target districts. Specific objective: Improve food, nutrition and asset security, strengthen communities productive and resilience capacities and, facilitate responsive food security policies and practices at targeted households, communities and district levels, (micro/meso levels).

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)
European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Afghanistan

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Afghanistan

description.narrative: Afghanistan 32 Communities Takhar (11 Chah Ab and 10 Namak Ab Districts) and Badakhshan Provinces (11 Raghistan District)

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
